title: Phan's Girl - Chapter 12 - KytheWolf - Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description: Summary: Adolescence is a difficult time for everyone, and Dan and Phil are struggling to connect with their daughter as she enters this challenging period of her life and begins pushing them away to struggle through her problems alone. Luckily for the little family, Louise knows how to help them find each other again.

blog.name: do-it-with-the-howell-lesters
blog.title: welcome!
blog.description:
Welcome to our phanfic blog!

Ashley and Holly here! Have a look through our works on the page below!

Mobile Masterlist

question: “I don’t like being sticky”
answer:
Dan was sniggering at the camera, and Phil well- Phil was not impressed.

“Stop laughing Dan.”

Dan did not, which earned him a deathly glare from Phil.

“I don’t like being sticky.”

Dan simply laughed, looking at Phil as some a dollop of cream cheese rolled down his face from his hear. “You chose to wear it.”

“I am not eating a tub of cream cheese.”  He scowled at the camera, then pouted in defeat.

Why they had decided doing the ‘eat it or wear it’ challenge for the gaming channel, was beyond him.

That was the last time he let Twitter polls decide their gaming content.

Ever.

click here to read our other prompts

summary: Hey :) I have a distant memory of an article about a "big british youtuber" that wasn't named that hasn't come out and explained...
question: Hey :) I have a distant memory of an article about a "big british youtuber" that wasn't named that hasn't come out and explained why and there were people saying it could be Dan (which idk). Did I dream that? Or is there an actual article like that somewhere?
answer:
hey b! it’s a real article from 2015 (x) from a closeted youtuber series, i believe what you’re looking for is this quote:

“TenEighty contacted a YouTuber who identifies as gay, but has chosen not to disclose their sexuality online. They wish to remain anonymous for this article. “I don’t feel as though I’ve not come out, as everyone in my ‘real life’ knows I’m gay and that I’ve had a partner for five years,” they say.”

so theoretically could be dan or phil but like. it’s anonymous. and it was from 2015 so imo it’s another one of those things it’s probs best not to drag out from the past and make a big deal of ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

blog.name: do-it-with-the-howell-lesters
blog.title: welcome!
blog.description:
Welcome to our phanfic blog!

Ashley and Holly here! Have a look through our works on the page below!

Mobile Masterlist

question: "Mmm, right there. Fuck..." but innocent. :)))))))
answer:
“Mmm, right there. Fuck…” Phil drawled the noises in a low voice, rolling his neck.

“Phil-”

Phil cut him off with a low groan, biting his lip. “Fuck Dan, yes, righ-”

Dan clamped a hand over his boyfriend mouth, looking apologetically (and embarrassed) at Louise.

“I swear to god Phil if you don’t stop making sex noises, I will have Lou strangle you. It’s  just a neck massage you spork!”

blog.description:
Welcome to our phanfic blog!

Ashley and Holly here! Have a look through our works on the page below!

Mobile Masterlist

summary: "Pass the salt, dad." Two hands reach for the salt. :)))))
question: "Pass the salt, dad." Two hands reach for the salt. :)))))
answer:
“Pass the salt, dad.”

At the same time, both Dan and Phil reached for the salt, and 8 year old Jackson Howell-Lester looked between them, tilting his head adorably at the confused and stubborn look his fathers were sharing.

Dan huffed, “Phil, he meant me, I’m daddy.” He tried to take the salt shaker from Phil’s hand, but his husband held it tight.

“He said dad, not daddy.” Phil maintained, “Which means he could mean either of us.”

It was the first time Jackson had addressed either of them as dad, instead of daddy or papa, so the two were at an impasse of who their son was actually talking to.

They both looked at each other stubbornly, then at Jackson.

Their son promptly shoved a forkful of food into his mouth after a long moment.

“You know what, I don’t need salt.”

tags: using gender neutral pronouns for each other's companions?
summary: A reason I love Dan: When he makes jokes about Phil hooking up with someone, he uses non gendered pronouns. During a spookyweek...
question: A reason I love Dan: When he makes jokes about Phil hooking up with someone, he uses non gendered pronouns. During a spookyweek video, I think PT, Phil makes a joke about being a "vampire cat in the sheets" and Dan says "you're a vampire cat when you're having sex with people?" and during the miss muffat ep of Undertale, when they're patting guard 2 Phil says "bongo bongo bongo boob" and dan says "never say that if you're having sex with someone" I just appreciate it.
answer:
okay yes and i want to expand on it and add phil to the love bc when designing the perfect lover for dan in pj’s ultimate companion vid (x) he created a person with gender neutral pronouns?

tell me why you love dnp
